project.name: Agilo for Scrum
project.description: Agilo for Scrum provides an intuitive workflow for your agile projects. Agilo addresses the needs of each scrum role and facilitates the ceremonies of the scrum process by exposing simple interfaces for managing the scrum artifacts. Agilo for Scrum is a collaboration product for teams, both distributed and co-located. It provides tools that allow a team to quickly communicate change and progress to its members. It guides each team member through the Scrum process, and provides immediate feedback during the Sprint. It is available for multiple teams too.
